bug.author: lgeiger
bug.summary: TensorBoard Hub component doesn't have "latest" tag
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Describe the bug</denchmark-h>
When following <denchmark-link:https://polyaxon.com/integrations/tensorboard/>https://polyaxon.com/integrations/tensorboard/</denchmark-link> to deploy a TensorBoard service the first command fails since doesn't exist. Either a default TensorBoard component is missing on the public Hub or the docs need to be updated. <denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
Run polyaxon -v hub --name=tensorboard get which will fail with: <denchmark-code>$ polyaxon -v hub --name=tensorboard get Starting new HTTPS connection (1): raw.githubusercontent.com:443 https://raw.githubusercontent.com:443 "GET /polyaxon/polyaxon-hub/master/tensorboard/latest.yaml HTTP/1.1" 404 14 Could not get component `tensorboard`. Error message: Component `tensorboard` was not found, please check that the name and tag are valid. </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
Command succeeds and gets info for the TensorBoard component. <denchmark-h:h3>Environment</denchmark-h>
Polyaxon CE v1.1

comments.comment: Yes, I am aware of this one, the docs get generated for all components, may be we should just make a latest version similarl to single-run.
